description: IMainGo XP is an ultra-portable stereo and protective case that custom fits your iPad 1 or 2. Four speakers and tuned bass delivers an amazing sound-clear highs, rich deep basses. Just open your iMainGo XP. Plug in your iPad. Turn your music on. Stand back. Perfect for music, movies, and games.
title: iMainGo XP iPad 1/iPad 2 Portable Speaker Case
